defination.title: VFX Engineer
defination.defination: #VFX engineers are beings who create illusions or visual tricks used in the film, television, theatre, video game and similar  industries to simulate the imagined events in a story or virtual world.

defination.title: Sound Editing
defination.defination: #MSound Editing is all magic about sound.
